name: Postage Escape
description:
Hello my name is Kingames I come from Croatia and this is my first game ever made.

I spent about a week on it.

The point of the game is to avoid walls and postage scanners and get in a delivery truck so you don't have to pay postage, it has 5 levels each being harder and I myself consider this game to be a bit hard. Another thing to note is that it is pretty short do not expect a 30 hour experience with it, that's my future projects ;)

Let me know what you think about it and if you were able to complete it! 

-Kingames
